name: zk-id
description: Privacy-preserving identity verification using zero-knowledge proofs

scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=@zk-id/circuits && npm run build --workspace=@zk-id/core && npm run build --workspace=@zk-id/sdk && npm run build --workspace=@zk-id/issuer && npm run build --workspace=@zk-id/redis && npm run build --workspace=@zk-id/contracts && npm run build --workspace=@zk-id/example-web-app
scripts.build:core: npm run build --workspace=@zk-id/core && npm run build --workspace=@zk-id/sdk && npm run build --workspace=@zk-id/issuer && npm run build --workspace=@zk-id/redis
scripts.clean: find packages -name 'dist' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true && find packages -name 'node_modules' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.fresh: npm run clean && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm install && npm run build
